item.title: Avid Business Solutions
item.description:
About Us

Avid Business Solutions offers comprehensive services in accounting, taxation, and business registrations, including the incorporation of companies. With a focus on personalized service and expert advice, we help businesses navigate their financial needs efficiently.

Our Services

  • Accounting: Professional accounting services for businesses of all sizes
  • Taxation: Expert tax planning and compliance services
  • Business Registrations: Assistance with all aspects of business registration
  • Company Incorporation: Complete company incorporation and setup services

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Sabita Seelochan-Mohammed
  • Phone: 310-9624
  • Email: ss.mohammed20@hotmail.com
